title: (x) Atlantic Swiss typeface - Bank Gothic {Mike Y}
content:
Hello,

I have been given this logo by my client and asked to change the wording on the lower part of the logo, only problem is the typeface is in outlines and i can't figure out what typeface it is... any help would be great.

Thank you  
James
